fields.name: Description
fields.value: Computes (ST(1) ∗ log2 (ST(0))), stores the result in register ST(1), and pops the FPU register stack. The source operand in ST(0) must be a non-zero positive number.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: The following table shows the results obtained when taking the log of various classes of numbers, assuming that neither overflow nor underflow occurs.
